member.name: P:Ice.Tablesets.ZDataTableRow.RestrictedByTer
member.summary: If yes then this table is restricted by accessiable sales territories

member.name: P:Ice.Tablesets.ZDataTableRow.RestrictedByPlant
member.summary: If yes then this table is restricted by accessiable Sites

member.name: P:Ice.Tablesets.ZDataTableRow.FullSync
member.summary: controls the behavior of object designer field synchronization with the db schema. When set True, the synch process will bring in all the DB fields from a DB table into the zDataFields table. When set to False, the synch process will only update the fields that are currently in the zDataFields table.

member.name: P:Ice.Tablesets.ZDataTableRow.TableType
member.summary: DB = Database, TT = Temp Table, RP = Report Parameter, PP = Process Parameter. This value can be used for filtering table searches, controling sensitivity of fields, and controlling references by datasets. Field sensitivity rules based on this value are

member.name: P:Ice.Tablesets.ZDataTableRow.SystemFlag
member.summary: Indicates a base System record (delivered by Epicor). System records may be overlaid during patch/release updates.

member.name: P:Ice.Tablesets.ZDataTableRow.TableLabel
member.summary: A descriptive label for the table that the system may use in the construction of a message. Ex: Can not delete one or more "Bill of Lading" records exist. Where Bill of Lading is the label. Which is much better that use the table name "BOLHead".

member.name: P:Ice.Tablesets.ZDataTableRow.ChgLogID
member.summary: Identifier value the system will use when creating Change Log records for this specific table (ChgLog.Indentifier) ChgLogID must be the same for a set of related tables. For example: Customer, ShipTo, CustBillTo, CustCnt, are all related and will have a ChgLogID = "Customer". TIP: Using the tablename of the highest level parent table as the ChgLogID may avoid accidental duplication.

member.name: P:Ice.Tablesets.ZDataTableRow.CGCCode
member.summary: Country Group Code / Country Code for CSF

member.name: P:Ice.Tablesets.ZDataTableRow.SysRevID
member.summary: Revision identifier for this row. It is incremented upon each write.

member.name: P:Ice.Tablesets.ZDataTableRow.SysRowID
member.summary: Unique identifier for this row. The value is a GUID.

member.name: P:Ice.Tablesets.ZLookupLinkRow.SystemFlag
member.summary: Indicates a base System record (delivered by Epicor). System records may be overlaid during patch/release updates.

member.name: P:Ice.Tablesets.ZDataFieldRow.Delimiters
member.summary: Contains the characters that are used as delimiters for when building a list from values of this data field. So during data entry we should validate none of these charater is in the value of this data field.
